memberdef.definition: typedef std::string(* TinyCRServer< K, V >::CommandFunction) (std::string data, TinyCRServer< K, V > *tinyCRServer)
memberdef.name: CommandFunction

memberdef.argsstring: (int port, std::vector< K > positive_keys, std::vector< K > negative_keys)
memberdef.name: TinyCRServer

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor for TinyCRServer
port
The port that the server should run on
positive_keys
The list of unrevoked keys.
negative_keys
The list of revoked keys.
Starts tiny CR server. Send delta updates on changes, monitor port for new devices and start a socket server for communication from the Certificate Authority.

Adds a new certificate, value 1 corresponds to valid certificate and 0 to invalid
kv
Key value pair of the key that should be added and the value it should hold
Status of adding the certificate.

Adds multiple certificates at the same time.
kv_pairs
A vector of pairs that will be inserted.
Return a boolean for the success of the addition.

Removes and existing certificate NOT IMPLEMENTED
key
The key that should be removed.
Status of removing the certificate.

Unrevoke an existing certificate
key
Key that should be unrevoked.
Status of unrevoking the certificate.

Revoke and existing certificate
key
Key that should be revoked.
Status of revoking the certificate.

Query a certificate
key
Key, which should be queried
bool indicating if the key is revoked or unrevoked

Queries multiple keys
keys
Keys to be queried
The values of the keys

Average latency of a successful DASS update.
statistic
The name of the statistic
The value of the statistic

Converts a sockaddr_in to a string.
in
The sockaddr that should be converted
The string form of sockaddr

Sends a full update through the socket
socket
The socket which the full update will be sent through

memberdef.argsstring: (std::vector< pair< K, V >> kvs, std::vector< uint8_t > actions)
memberdef.name: sendSummaryUpdate

detaileddescription.para:
Sends a summary update based on the action.
kv
Key value pair that is mutated.
action
Action that is being done to the key value pair.
Status of sending the update.

Sends full updates to all registered clients
The success of the action
Listens for new devices and sends the DASS
